title: Folder2List incl Patch + Portable
description:
Description: 
Folder2List 3.12.3 + Portable 
When creating lists of data, you can use parameters such as size, creation date, file extensions. In addition, you can use different metadata contained in the files. This function allows you to create for example MP3-lists that store information about artists, album and genre. With Folder2List you can easily print the contents of a folder. Or you can save the contents of the directory as a text file, a CSV file, and others that you need to further process the extracted information. It's also worth writing about advanced filtering and sorting functions, they can be applied to many properties (for example, file extensions, image size and creation date). 
Developer: Gillmeister Software 

License: ShareWare - for you for nothing 
Language: English - Russian version and Russifier not available 
The size: 18.20 MB 
OS: Windows 
Version: 3.12.3 

How to Install: 
1). Instructions are included in ReadMe.txt if needed. 
2). Thats all, Done & enjoy
